name: Europa Universalis IV: Mare Nostrum
description:
Europa Universalis IV: Mare Nostrum is a strategy game developed by Plug In Digital and Paradox Development Studio. It came out on 05-04-2016. Paradox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Europa Universalis IV: Mare Nostrum on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
